hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Hylian Shield#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #4# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that in the #nine thrones room# of the Spirit Temple spiders hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ GS Nine Thrones Room West
Spirit Temple MQ GS Nine Thrones Room North

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold respectively...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple MQ GS Sun Block Room

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Nut Capacity# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Hylian Shield#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: This is a haiku&Five syllables then seven&Five more to finish

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZD (Mweep).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #the Spooky Mask# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #the Keaton Mask#.
